dependencyDashboardHeader:
This dashboard tracks Godot Engine and CI dependency updates.

- 🎮 **Godot versions** are automatically updated from GitHub releases
- 📅 **Updates run** every Monday morning
- 🧪 **Testing** is required before merging major updates

customManagers.description: Update Godot matrix version and status
